title: MLK Collectibles
description:
Darren Rovell can't be racist... He has a large amount of MLK memorabilia (00:01:00). Steve's a Liar is back with a vengeance (00:35:35). Mike is the next guest on 'A Theater Near Me' and we're hoping for a little more energy out of Chris (00:50:56). Stephen A. Smith almost died from Covid, Guy Geller is saying all the right things & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
